member.summary: Gets the smooth skeletons averaged over the last updates.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Gestures.UnitySdk.GesturesManager.LatestDefaultSkeleton
member.summary: Gets the latest default skeleton. The default skeleton is the one closest to the physical camera, giving precedence to right hands while falling back to left if right is not available

member.name: P:Microsoft.Gestures.UnitySdk.GesturesManager.SmoothDefaultSkeleton
member.summary: Gets the latest smooth default skeleton. The default skeleton is the one closest to the physical camera, giving precedence to right hands while falling back to left if right is not available

member.name: F:Microsoft.Gestures.UnitySdk.GesturesManager.IsSuspendEventOnLostFocus
